query:
SELECT
            name,
            description,
            COALESCE(
                (
                    SELECT array_agg(mi.relative_path)
                    FROM album_media_item ami
                        JOIN media_item mi ON ami.media_item_id = mi.id
                    WHERE ami.album_id = $1
                ),
                '{}'
            ) AS "relative_paths!"
        FROM album
        WHERE album.id = $1
